titleStmt.title: The confider in falshood confounded. Being an answer to an abusive book lately published by William Wright of Dublin, against Thomas Carleton his tenant in the first place: And Will. Edmondson, John Burnyet, Abraham Fuller, and Franc. Randall, arbitrators, in the second place; equally chosen to end some difference between the said William Wright and Thomas Carleton, &c.
titleStmt.author: Carleton, Tho. (Thomas)

publicationStmt.date: printed in the year of our Lord 1684.
